name: flowboy-portfolio
description: Sevas's portfolio site built with Clojure & Tailwind CSS

scripts.clj:dev: fswatch -0 -r --event Updated --latency 1 src/clj resources/config.edn | xargs -0 -n 1 clj -M:clj-build
scripts.preview: exec concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run serve" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run browser"
scripts.nuke: echo Nuking everything ðŸ’£ &&  mv resources/public/assets resources/assets && rm -rf resources/public
scripts.postnuke: mkdir resources/public && mv resources/assets resources/public/assets && npm run postinstall && echo Done ðŸ’£ && tree resources/public
scripts.dev: npm run nuke && exec concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run clj:build && npm run clj:dev" "npm run css:dev" "npm run cljs:dev" "npm run serve" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run browser"
scripts.build: npm run nuke && exec concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run clj:build" "npm run css:build" "npm run cljs:build" "npm run serve" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run browser"
